job_tasks.phrase: Leiden en innoveren: Neem het voortouw in de technische ontwikkeling van ons Shopify Plus e-commerceplatform over zes domeinen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes taking the lead in the technical development of an e-commerce platform, which falls under traditional software engineering leadership and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Bepaal samen met de oprichters de technologische koers van ons Shopify-platform, implementeer best practices, en blijf continu op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen binnen het Shopify-ecosysteem.
job_tasks.justification: This describes setting technological direction, implementing best practices, and staying updated within a specific ecosystem, all core software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Verken en integreer LLM's en AI om je eigen werk of onze interne workflows om bedrijfsprocessen en klantervaringen te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions exploring and integrating LLMs and AI to improve workflows and customer experiences, which aligns with using AI models, though it's stated as not the main part of the role.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt aan front- en backend, integreert met externe systemen en zet CI/CD, testing en codekwaliteit hoog in het vaandel.
job_tasks.justification: This describes hands-on front-end and back-end development, integration with external systems, and emphasis on CI/CD, testing, and code quality, which are all core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt en verbetert features die direct waarde toevoegen.
job_tasks.justification: Building and improving features that add direct value is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Werk nauw samen met een klein multidisciplinair team om prioriteiten te stellen die aansluiten bij onze ambitieuze doelen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration with a team to set priorities aligned with business goals, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt verantwoordelijkheid, krijgt alle ruimte om beslissingen te nemen, en helpt ons team effectiever te werken.
job_tasks.justification: Taking responsibility, making decisions, and improving team effectiveness are aspects of software engineering leadership and process improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Maak gebruik van CI/CD-pipelines, E2E-testing en zorg voor betrouwbare code door middel van geautomatiseerde tests en code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase details the use of CI/CD pipelines, end-to-end testing, and automated tests/code reviews, which are MLOps/DevOps practices for ensuring code quality and reliability.

soft_skills.phrase: Leiden en innoveren: Neem het voortouw in de technische ontwikkeling van ons Shopify Plus e-commerceplatform over zes domeinen.
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'Leiden en innoveren' (Lead and innovate) directly points to innovation and taking initiative.

soft_skills.phrase: Bepaal samen met de oprichters de technologische koers van ons Shopify-platform
soft_skills.justification: Determining the technological course with founders aligns with understanding business strategy and aligning technology with it.

soft_skills.phrase: Verken en integreer LLM's en AI om je eigen werk of onze interne workflows om bedrijfsprocessen en klantervaringen te verbeteren.
soft_skills.justification: Exploring and integrating LLMs and AI for business process improvement indicates a focus on applying AI models, even if not the primary task.

soft_skills.phrase: Werk nauw samen met een klein multidisciplinair team om prioriteiten te stellen die aansluiten bij onze ambitieuze doelen.
soft_skills.justification: Working closely with a multidisciplinary team to set priorities clearly indicates collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt verantwoordelijkheid, krijgt alle ruimte om beslissingen te nemen
soft_skills.justification: Taking responsibility and having the freedom to make decisions demonstrates ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: blijf continu op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen binnen het Shopify-ecosysteem.
soft_skills.justification: Staying continuously updated with new developments shows a commitment to learning and adaptability.

While not explicitly stated with a single phrase, the overall emphasis on hands-on development, integrating systems, and improving features implies a problem-solving and pragmatic approach to delivering value.
soft_skills.phrase: Je bouwt en verbetert features die direct waarde toevoegen.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on core software engineering tasks (Shopify Plus, React, front-end/back-end development, CI/CD, testing, integration). While it mentions exploring and integrating LLMs and AI for workflows, this is explicitly stated as 'not the main part of your role'. The role is about building and improving an e-commerce platform, with AI/LLM integration being a secondary, albeit encouraged, aspect. This aligns with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile, where the core is software engineering, and AI/ML is integrated into the product or workflows.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite clear about the primary focus being on e-commerce platform development and integration, with AI/LLM as a secondary, exploratory aspect. The technologies mentioned are also specific. The only slight ambiguity is the depth of the 'exploring and integrating LLMs' part, but the explicit statement that it's not the main component makes the overall profile assignment confident.
